messages.subject: Re: questions regarding contest
messages.msgSnippet: ... Im at an airport right now, but off the top of my head I think there were 7 entries (I think there were 8 last year, so the people who put it off too late
messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "Rod Pavez" <grfkboyz@...> wrote:
>
> Maybe I should have asked this a while ago but i was wondering
> how many people have entered stories for the contest and if
> there are 8 gennres for it will there be a winner for each or an
> overall winner?
>

Im at an airport right now, but off the top of my head I think there
were 7 entries (I think there were 8 last year, so the people who put
it off too late this year can get started now, since it will happen
again next year) so the prize should be $70 minus 5%. Again, off the
top of my head - I think the entries ranged from historical fiction,
pulp fiction, what if, and ghost stories, but Ive probably missed one
or two genres. The judging will start within 24 hours.

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] questions regarding contest
messages.msgSnippet: thank you for your answer, Nate. Nate Ledbetter  wrote:  Kitsuno s out for the time being, so I ll reply: I am not sure of the total
messages.messageBody:
thank you for your answer, Nate.

Nate Ledbetter <ltdomer98@...> wrote: Kitsuno's out for the time being, so I'll reply:

I am not sure of the total number of entries, but
there will only be one winner and one runner up prize
given. Unfortunately, not enough people entered to
have competitions for each genre. You can't give a
prize to someone if they are the only one within that
genre's entries.

Nate

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] questions regarding contest
messages.msgSnippet: Kitsuno s out for the time being, so I ll reply: I am not sure of the total number of entries, but there will only be one winner and one runner up prize given.
messages.messageBody:
Kitsuno's out for the time being, so I'll reply:

I am not sure of the total number of entries, but
there will only be one winner and one runner up prize
given. Unfortunately, not enough people entered to
have competitions for each genre. You can't give a
prize to someone if they are the only one within that
genre's entries.

Nate

messages.msgSnippet: Maybe I should have asked this a while ago but i was wondering how many people have entered stories for the contest and if there are 8 gennres for it will
messages.messageBody:
Maybe I should have asked this a while ago but i was wondering
how many people have entered stories for the contest and if
there are 8 gennres for it will there be a winner for each or an
overall winner?
